rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample storage space for coats and shoes.
Spacious living area oriented towards the central courtyard to ensure natural light, following Vastu guidelines. Features an open layout connecting with the dining area.
Adjacent to the living room, positioned near the kitchen for ease of service while maintaining separation from the social hub.
Modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and a small prep area. Positioned in the south-east corner to balance energy flow as per Vastu.
Master bedroom with ample closet space, overlooking the courtyard for calm views and natural light.
Second bedroom designed for additional living space, ensuring privacy and quiet ambiance.
A functional bathroom with water-efficient fixtures, located adjacent to the bedrooms.

openings.description: Double glass door allowing natural light and maintaining security.
Small balcony attached to the living room for outdoor access.
Access point connecting all rooms with the central courtyard.

rooms.description: Ensuite master bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, offering unobstructed views of the courtyard.
Home theater room designed for a cinematic experience with optimal acoustics and seating arrangement, located in the east to reduce noise from the west-facing pool area.
A dedicated study or guest room to maximize versatility of space.
Bathroom for the home theater/guest area, ensuring privacy and functionality.

openings.description: Well-lit staircase connecting both levels for easy access, adhering to safety norms.
Balcony overlooking the pool and courtyard, enhancing aesthetic appeal.

additional_features.description: Modern swimming pool integrated with landscape design; west-facing plot ensures minimal sun glare.
A tranquil courtyard providing natural ventilation, light, and a communal gathering space in line with Vastu principles.
